bio: My name is Alana, a mage hailing from the arid deserts of Sentinel in Hammerfell. The searing sunsets of my homeland may be far from the icy reaches of Skyrim, but destiny has called me to these frigid lands, where I wield flames to remind me of the warmth of my home. Growing up in Sentinel, I discovered my affinity for fire magic at a young age. My parents, both skilled spellcasters, nurtured my talents, and soon I became adept at conjuring flames that danced with my will. It was not long before I left Hammerfell in search of greater knowledge and challenges. I joined the College of Winterhold, where I honed my skills and delved into the ancient secrets of magic. My mastery over the flames allowed me to scorch my foes, turning them into smoldering ash. As I continue my journey through these harsh lands, I seek to unravel the mysteries of Dwemer ruins. Skyrim may be a realm of cold and ice, but I am its flame.
name: Alana
